name: Project: Bork
description:
The objective of the game is to bring the toy Lily, your owner, and earn lots of Doggo Points! You have to be careful though, she is teaching you tricks! If you walk while she wants you to sit, you will lose Doggo Points. You can spend your hard earned Doggo Points in the shop for upgrades and items. The move keys are A & D, or Left and Right arrow keys.

This simple game is a fan game made for LilyPichu. (" https://twitter.com/LilyPichu ").
